comment.brief: Activates while the element is at least partially within the ScrollView.
comment.full: Activates while the element is at least partially within the ScrollView.

comment.brief: Activates while the element is completely visible within the ScrollView.
comment.full: Activates while the element is completely visible within the ScrollView.

comment.brief: How the bounds of an element are treated.
comment.full:
How the bounds of an element are treated.

Default is `Partial`. When set to `Full`, the whole element bounds need to be inside view for the `WhileVisibleInScrollView` trigger to activate.

Both options can be combined with `Distance` to adjust when the trigger activates.
